description:
Inside the Precipice World, Rukia and the others act as decoys to draw away the Reigai’s attention while Ichigo, Urahara, and Kon break into the Seireitei. As they search for Kageroza’s laboratory, Urahara makes an attempt to restore Ichigo’s lost Soul Reaper powers but is discovered by the Reigai of Nemu and Nanao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagerouza o Oe! Gijutsu Kaihatsukyoku, Sennyuu!
Pursue Kageroza! Technological Development Department, Infiltration!
À la poursuite de Kageroza. Infiltration dans le département de recherche technologique
影狼佐(かげろうざ)を追え! 技術開発局, 潜入!
